verses.verse: Now it came to pass,<WH1961> as<WH834> David<WH1732> sat<WH3427> in his house,<WH1004> that David<WH1732> said<WH559> to<WH413> Nathan<WH5416> the prophet,<WH5030> Lo,<WH2009> I<WH595> dwell<WH3427> in a house<WH1004> of cedars,<WH730> but the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD<WH3068> remaineth under<WH8478> curtains.<WH3407>
Then Nathan<WH5416> said<WH559> unto<WH413> David,<WH1732> Do<WH6213> all<WH3605> that<WH834> is in thine heart;<WH3824> for<WH3588> God<WH430> is with<WH5973> thee.
And it came to pass<WH1961> the same<WH1931> night,<WH3915> that the word<WH1697> of God<WH430> came<WH1961> to<WH413> Nathan,<WH5416> saying,<WH559>
Go <WH1980> and tell<WH559> <WH413> David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> Thou<WH859> shalt not<WH3808> build<WH1129> me a house<WH1004> to dwell in: <WH3427>

For <WH3588> I have not<WH3808> dwelt<WH3427> in a house<WH1004> since<WH4480> the day<WH3117> that<WH834> I brought up<WH5927> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day;<WH3117> but have gone<WH1961> from tent<WH4480> <WH168> to<WH413> tent,<WH168> and from one tabernacle<WH4480> <WH4908> to another.

Wheresoever <WH3605> <WH834> I have walked<WH1980> with all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> spoke<WH1696> I a word<WH1697> to<WH854> any<WH259> of the judges<WH8199> of Israel,<WH3478> whom<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> to feed<WH7462> <WH853> my people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Why<WH4100> have ye not<WH3808> built<WH1129> me a house<WH1004> of cedars?<WH730>

Now <WH6258> therefore thus<WH3541> shalt thou say<WH559> unto my servant<WH5650> David,<WH1732> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> I<WH589> took<WH3947> thee from<WH4480> the sheepcote,<WH5116> even from<WH4480> following<WH310> the sheep,<WH6629> that thou shouldest be<WH1961> ruler<WH5057> over<WH5921> my people<WH5971> Israel: <WH3478>

And I have been<WH1961> with<WH5973> thee whithersoever<WH3605> <WH834> thou hast walked,<WH1980> and have cut off<WH3772> <WH853> all<WH3605> thine enemies<WH341> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> thee, and have made<WH6213> thee a name<WH8034> like the name<WH8034> of the great men<WH1419> that<WH834> are in the earth.<WH776>

Also I will ordain<WH7760> a place<WH4725> for my people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and will plant<WH5193> them, and they shall dwell<WH7931> in their place,<WH8478> and shall be moved<WH7264> no<WH3808> more;<WH5750> neither<WH3808> shall the children<WH1121> of wickedness<WH5766> waste<WH1086> them any more,<WH3254> as<WH834> at the beginning,<WH7223>

And since the time<WH4480> <WH3117> that<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> judges<WH8199> to be over<WH5921> my people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478> Moreover I will subdue<WH3665> <WH853> all<WH3605> thine enemies.<WH341> Furthermore I tell<WH5046> thee that the LORD<WH3068> will build<WH1129> thee a house.<WH1004>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> when<WH3588> thy days<WH3117> be expired<WH4390> that thou must go<WH1980> to be with<WH5973> thy fathers,<WH1> that I will raise up<WH6965> <WH853> thy seed<WH2233> after<WH310> thee, which<WH834> shall be<WH1961> of thy sons;<WH4480> <WH1121> and I will establish<WH3559> <WH853> his kingdom.<WH4438>
He <WH1931> shall build<WH1129> me a house,<WH1004> and I will establish<WH3559> <WH853> his throne<WH3678> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>

I <WH589> will be<WH1961> his father,<WH1> and he<WH1931> shall be<WH1961> my son:<WH1121> and I will not<WH3808> take my mercy away<WH5493> <WH2617> from<WH4480> <WH5973> him, as<WH834> I took<WH5493> it from him that<WH4480> <WH834> was<WH1961> before<WH6440> thee:
But I will settle<WH5975> him in mine house<WH1004> and in my kingdom<WH4438> forever:<WH5704> <WH5769> and his throne<WH3678> shall be<WH1961> established<WH3559> forevermore.<WH5704> <WH5769>
According to all<WH3605> these<WH428> words,<WH1697> and according to all<WH3605> this<WH2088> vision,<WH2377> so<WH3651> did Nathan<WH5416> speak<WH1696> unto<WH413> David.<WH1732>

And David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> came<WH935> and sat<WH3427> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> Who<WH4310> am I,<WH589> O LORD<WH3068> God,<WH430> and what<WH4310> is mine house,<WH1004> that<WH3588> thou hast brought<WH935> me hitherto?<WH5704> <WH1988>

And yet this<WH2063> was a small thing<WH6994> in thine eyes,<WH5869> O God;<WH430> for thou hast also spoken<WH1696> of<WH5921> thy servant's<WH5650> house<WH1004> for a great while to come,<WH4480> <WH7350> and hast regarded<WH7200> me according to the estate<WH8448> of a man<WH120> of high degree,<WH4609> O LORD<WH3068> God.<WH430>
What <WH4100> can David<WH1732> speak more<WH3254> <WH5750> to<WH413> thee for the honor<WH3519> of<WH853> thy servant?<WH5650> for thou<WH859> knowest<WH3045> <WH853> thy servant.<WH5650>

O LORD,<WH3068> for thy servant's sake,<WH5668> <WH5650> and according to thine own heart,<WH3820> hast thou done<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> this<WH2063> greatness,<WH1420> in making known<WH3045> <WH853> all<WH3605> these great things.<WH1420>
O LORD,<WH3068> there is none<WH369> like thee,<WH3644> neither<WH369> is there any God<WH430> beside<WH2108> thee, according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> we have heard<WH8085> with our ears.<WH241>

And what<WH4310> one<WH259> nation<WH1471> in the earth<WH776> is like thy people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> whom<WH834> God<WH430> went<WH1980> to redeem<WH6299> to be his own people,<WH5971> to make<WH7760> thee a name<WH8034> of greatness<WH1420> and terribleness,<WH3372> by driving out<WH1644> nations<WH1471> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> thy people,<WH5971> whom<WH834> thou hast redeemed<WH6299> out of Egypt?<WH4480> <WH4714>
For <WH853> thy people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> didst thou make<WH5414> thine own people<WH5971> forever;<WH5704> <WH5769> and thou,<WH859> LORD,<WH3068> becamest<WH1961> their God.<WH430>

Therefore now,<WH6258> LORD,<WH3068> let the thing<WH1697> that<WH834> thou hast spoken<WH1696> concerning<WH5921> thy servant<WH5650> and concerning<WH5921> his house<WH1004> be established<WH539> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> and do<WH6213> as<WH834> thou hast said.<WH1696>

Let it even be established,<WH539> that thy name<WH8034> may be magnified<WH1431> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> saying,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> even a God<WH430> to Israel:<WH3478> and let the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> thy servant<WH5650> be established<WH3559> before<WH6440> thee.

For <WH3588> thou,<WH859> O my God,<WH430> hast told<WH1540> <WH853> <WH241> thy servant<WH5650> that thou wilt build<WH1129> him a house:<WH1004> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> thy servant<WH5650> hath found<WH4672> in his heart to pray<WH6419> before<WH6440> thee.
And now,<WH6258> LORD,<WH3068> thou<WH859> art God,<WH430> and hast promised<WH1696> this<WH2063> goodness<WH2896> unto<WH5921> thy servant: <WH5650>

Now <WH6258> therefore let it please<WH2974> thee to bless<WH1288> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of thy servant,<WH5650> that it may be<WH1961> before<WH6440> thee forever:<WH5769> for<WH3588> thou<WH859> blessest,<WH1288> O LORD,<WH3068> and it shall be blessed<WH1288> forever.<WH5769>
